channel.title: About Me on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in About Me on D00k

item.title: Bookmarks
item.description: A small library of various bookmarks and websites I’ve kept over the years. Neatly sorted for ease of use! Webring ∙ XXIIVV Wiki. ∙ RitualDust. ∙ Thomasorus. ∙ Kokorobot. ∙ Fdisk. Web Magazines ∙ Low Tech Magazine. ∙ Real Life Mag. ∙ Compost. ∙ the Orphenyade. Pools of Knowledge ∙ Practical Self Reliance.

item.title: Now
item.description: June 2022 ∘ Finishing up my Rockbox theme for release. ∘ Updating and upgrading the website. ∘ Writing a guide to Rockbox theming. ∘ Hoping to take some more time to read this month. What’s Playing? ∘ Vibing to Invitation to Her's by Her's. ∘ Watching the entirety of Adventure Time. ∘ Enjoying the new Minecraft update with my friends. ∙ now 2022

item.title: Colophon
item.description: A comprehensive dive into the design, and creation of this website Background This site was made to scratch an itch I long had. Sharing stuff on social media has never been my mojo, I’ll often post my photography, however I yearned for something more expansive and exciting so I made a website. The first version of the site was made by modifying what I felt was a suitable theme, however I soon became aware of my lack of knowledge in web design and development, scrapping the site soon after I finished it.

item.title: Setup
item.description: A breakdown of the hardware and software I use for making things, or getting things done. Hardware Keychron C1 Keyboard ∘ Lenovo Thinkpad E580 Laptop. Cpu - Intel Core I5-8250U Memory - 12GB Storage - 256GB Samsung SSD Display - 1920x1080 LCD OS - Fedora Linux ∘ Keychron C1 Wired Keyboard. The Keychron C1 is an 85%, Tenkeyless wired mechanical Keyboard. I bought it mostly for it’s low price, as well for it’s lack of wireless and light-up features.
